description: '''Melodic metalcore''' is a fusion genre, incorporating elements of [[melodic death metal]] and [[metalcore]]; it has a heavy emphasis on melodic instrumentation, distorted guitar tones, [[palm mute|palm muting]], double bass drumming, [[blast beat]]s, metalcore-stylized [[Breakdown (music)|breakdowns]], and vocals that range from aggressive [[screaming (music)|screaming]] and [[death growl]]s to clean singing. The genre has seen commercial success for employing a more accessible sound at times compared to other forms of extreme music. Many notable melodic metalcore bands have been influenced by [[At the Gates]] and [[In Flames]].
